results.title: Loyal tubthumper: Minnie Appleby
results.brief_description: This program is an account of the life of Minnie Appleby (nee Birch) who was born in 1900 and died in 1982. Minnie Appleby’s life story echoes the development of women through this century - she was a suffragette, political speaker, communist activist, housewife, mother, working woman and, later in life, women’s liberationist.

results.title: Let's not say goodbye
results.creator_credit: Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
results.brief_description: The destruction of Australia’s bushland and forests threatens already endangered species. Members of the Theatre in Education and the Real Fantasy Theatre Company take a humorous look at this serious problem.

results.title: Show me English: a visit to the doctor [episode 5]
results.creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, Trevor Lunn, David Ferris and Victoria. Ministry of Education
results.brief_description: A series of programmes which aim to help adult migrants communicate in everyday situations. On the second visit to the doctor, Tina is given the result of her test and is prescribed medication and given advice on the importance of diet and rest. Home tutor program by the Adult Migrant Information Service.

results.title: Return to Botany Bay
results.creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, David Ferris and Victoria. Schools Division. Curriculum Branch
results.brief_description: Intersperses 1987 documentary footage of the re-enactment of the voyage of the First Fleet with Trevor Lunn interviewing an Australia Post representative discussing their role in the Bi-centennial re-enactment and production of the commemorative stamp series.

results.title: Visions of perfection
results.creator_credit: Diane Charleson, TV Ed Productions and Prahran School Support Centre
results.brief_description: The Victoria College of the Arts provides a venue for talented children in the performing arts of music and dance to combine these with their academic studies in a high school setting. A student violinist, percussionist, ballet dancer and pianist talk about the courses available and demonstrate some of the activities in the school.
